mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where ntitle like #{searchtext}
select count(*) from notice where ncontent like #{searchtext}
select count(*) from notice where ncategory = #{searchtext}

select rno, nid, ntitle, ndate,ncategory from (select rownum rno, nid, ntitle, to_char(ndate,'yyyy-mm-dd')ndate, ncategory from( select nid,ntitle,ndate,ncategory from notice where ntitle like concat(concat('%',#{searchtext}),'%') order by ndate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}

select rno, nid, ntitle, ndate,ncategory from (select rownum rno, nid, ntitle, to_char(ndate,'yyyy-mm-dd')ndate, ncategory from( select nid,ntitle,ndate,ncategory from notice where ncontent like concat(concat('%',#{searchtext}),'%') order by ndate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}

select rno, nid, ntitle, ndate,ncategory from (select rownum rno, nid, ntitle, to_char(ndate,'yyyy-mm-dd')ndate, ncategory from( select nid,ntitle,ndate,ncategory from notice where ncategory=#{searchtext} order by ndate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}

select nid,ntitle,ncontent,to_char(ndate,'yyyy-mm-dd')ndate,nfile,nsfile, nhits,ncategory,prevId,prevtitle,nextid,nexttitle,nwriter from (select nid,ntitle,ncontent,ndate,nhits,ncategory,nwriter,nfile,nsfile, lag(nid,1,0) over (order by ndate asc)prevId, lag(ntitle,1,0) over (order by ndate asc)prevTitle, lead(nid,1,0) over (order by ndate asc)nextId, lead(ntitle,1,0) over (order by ndate asc)nextTitle from notice) where nid=#{nId}

choose.otherwise: update notice set nTitle=#{nTitle}, nCategory=#{nCategory},nContent=#{nContent} where nid=#{nId}

mapper.update: update notice set nHits=nHits+1 where nid=#{nId}
